item.description:
Howdy partner! Hennessy's is having the first of their new COUNTRY THEMED Happy Hour this Friday! Hennessy's always has the after work music action.  This time, they are taking it to a whole 'nother level!

Come on down after work, don your cowboy hat, grab an icy cold bevvy, RELAX AND ENJOY some honky tonk tunes!  There is no cover charge.  Hennessy's offers $2 Guinness Black Lager and $3 Bud Light Drafts. They also have a $4 bar shot called a "Country Apple". :)

I should be there right after I get out of work.  Hennessy's is conveniently located on Union Street in the Haymarket (Orange and Green Lines), Government Center (Green and Blue Lines), and a short walk from Park Street (Red and Green Lines).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink.  SO PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB.

Hope to see you there!

Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture. You can ask the doorman or bartender if you can't find me.
item.name: COUNTRY MUSIC Happy Hour @ Hennessy's! YEEEHawww
